title: FS/FT: Lot of 16 T210-2 Old Mill **FINAL PRICE DROP**

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Lot of 16 T210-2 Old Mill **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T210 Series 2 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly lower grade cards as the scans will show, but most have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured (removing **SOLD** cards from list for easier viewing):

Schrader - $12
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.
Bump for another price drop.  Thanks for looking!
